title: 40 Perches Land For Lease Facing The Kalpityia Main Road
details:
Property Ref : KP40

This is a 40 perches land facing the Kalpityia main road within the Kalpitiya town center limits.

Now available for short term/long term lease with -

- Clear deed and title ( Sinnakkara - free hold )
- Drinking Water
- 3 Phase Electricity
- 20 Feet Road Access
- Fully fenced and gated
.
This land is suitable for restaurants, cafe, holiday bungalow or small hotel/resorts or any other tourism related projects.

Expected lease LKR 30,000/month

If interested please contact us on 0094 77 77 33 823 for further details

Thanks for looking :)
